column3: Fastred]] (twin), unnamed sister,<ref name="Mark"/><ref group="note">Under [[Fengel]] in [[Appendix A]] it states: "He was the third son and fourth child of Folcwine."</ref> [[Fengel]]

column2: Fastred]], was one of the twin sons of [[Folcwine]] of [[Rohan]].

column1: Upholding the [[Oath of Eorl]], he rode to the aid of [[Gondor]] with his brother, and both were slain in battle of the [[Haradrim]].<ref name="Mark"/> They were laid to rest where they fell, at the crossings of [[Poros]]. Their burial mound was called the [[Haudh in Gwanûr]], the Mound of the Twins.<ref>{{App
